Description_lang: You and your Kindred Spirit each gain a bonus secondary stat based on their Covenant. This bonus is halved for your Kindred Spirit, however both bonuses are doubled while the bond is Empowered.|CFFffffffKyrian|r: Mastery increased by $357564s2.|CFFffffffNight Fae|r: Haste increased by $357564s3%.|CFFffffffVenthyr|r: Critical Strike chance increased by $357564s4%.|CFFffffffNecrolord|r: Versatility increased by $357564s5%.
